# GitHub Copilot Metrics Dashboard

React application for visualizing GitHub Copilot metrics using Nivo charts.

## Project Structure
- React + TypeScript + Vite
- Nivo for data visualizations
- Tailwind CSS for styling with dark/light theme support
- GitHub Copilot Metrics API integration
- Theme Context for global theme management

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Follow React best practices with hooks
- Use responsive design patterns
- Always add functionality or features to the Demo section and Live section
- Support both dark and light themes using Tailwind's dark mode classes
- Use the ThemeContext for theme state management
